name: ODAS GLOBAL CONSULTING
goal:
ODAS GLOBAL CONSULTING LTD is a Romanian
company which provides business management services to
the highest quality standards.
The company was founded in 2003 and since then has been
dynamically envolving by offering a wide range of services,
from business and management consultancy to governmental, structural and international funds consultancy and feasibility studies.
Services:
1. Investments services
- Search and analyze various types of investments in areas such as tourism, agriculture, manufacturing factories and more;
- Ensures all logistic support for the investors
and for his partners to ensure a successful
investment process;
2. Business Services
3. Structural Funds consultancy
4. Financial consultancy
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
CCP and Common Foreign and Security Policy
CCP and EU Energy Policy – Energy Community Treaty and Bilateral Agreements
The EU/Eurozone and Global Monetary Governance
Challenges Ahead – Brexit & EU Trade and External Relations
CCP and EU Development Policy – Trade & Sustainable Development Clauses in Bilateral/Unilateral Instruments
EU & World Trade Organisation/Free Trade Agreements
New EU Competence for Foreign Direct Investment
EU & World Trade Organisation/Free Trade Agreements
Internal Market
Consumer Affairs
etc.
